oracle.dmt.jdm.algorithm.kmeans
Class OraSplitCriterion

java.lang.Object
  javax.datamining.Enum
      oracle.dmt.jdm.algorithm.kmeans.OraSplitCriterion

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable, java.io.Serializable
public class OraSplitCriterion
extends javax.datamining.Enum

OraKMeansSettings supports specifying split criterion as an input. By default kMeans variance is used as the split criterion. This can be changed to kMeans size using setSplitCriterion extension method in OraKMeansSettings.

See Also:
OraKMeansSettings, Serialized Form

Field Summary

          Setting value representing size as the split criterion.
